title: Netflix transfers user data to other businesses

tosdr.tldr: [In connection with any reorganization, restructuring, merger or sale, or other transfer of assets, we will transfer information, including personal information, provided that the receiving party agrees to respect your personal information in a manner that is consistent with our Privacy Statement.] This means that your information can be transferred to the hands of someone who is willing to sell your data to other marketers. If Netflix wants to, they may transfer all personal data to another company who can basically do whatever they want to it (unless it doesn't comply with Netflix's Privacy Policy.
